item.description:
Come out and hear some great music and enjoy some of the best swing dancing in the area!

Join Luan & Alan at The Leominster Elks, 134 N. Main Street, Leominster, MA in welcoming back one of the best swing bands world wide...Eight To The Bar! The Elks has a large floor, cash bar, awesome atmosphere and a great crowd of dancers.

Get your Dancin' Shoes on!

Doors Open At 6pm
6:30-7:30pm Beginner Friendly Swing Dance Lesson
7:30pm Swing Dance with Eight To The Bar!
Admission: $12
Come with or without a partner

Directions: From Rt. 2, East or West, take Ex 31A. That will put you on Rt. 12 South, go through three sets of lights, Elks is on your right. From Worcester take I-190 to Rt 2 West then follow above directions.
item.how_to_find_us: Red Meetup flyer on a table.
item.name: Swing dance, "Eight to the Bar" Leominster Elks, Leominster $12 includes lesson
